mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_SDCB_COMPARE_RESULT(REQUEST_ID, COMPARE_MONTH, EVENT_TIME, CASE_CODE, TRANSACTION_ID, STATUS_CODE, TOT_AMT, CTN, SUB_NO, ACT_TYPE) VALUES (#{requestId}, #{compareMonth}, #{eventTime}, #{caseCode}, #{transactionId}, #{statusCode}, #{totAmt}, #{cnt}, #{subNo}, #{actType})
